originalText.text:
UPS really sucks!!
I was expecting my items on a Friday, I just missed truck for literally 2 minutes. I called to arrange pick up. Guess what? No delivery until Monday.. no pick up until Monday. Cero stars for USuckP

originalText.text: The Stole My Package! I asked for a receipt and they refused to give me one! My return never got back to macys and I was never refunded for my merchandise after dropping it off here, not to mention this place is run-down and dirty and no one ever speaks English!

text.text: The Stole My Package! I asked for a receipt and they refused to give me one! My return never got back to macys and I was never refunded for my merchandise after dropping it off here, not to mention this place is run-down and dirty and no one ever speaks English!

originalText.text: I just had one of the worst experiences ever with a UPS delivery man to my office in the gramercy section of Manhattan today around 2:00pm.  The delivery man refused to bring very heavy boxes to the back of our office after informing him that I was pregnant, and very obviously pregnant and could not carry it myself.  I was extremely polite to him with my request.  He then proceeded to yell at me in my crowded waiting room that he does not have to do me any favors and continued on berating me and being the rudest person I have ever come in contact with. His behavior was so outrageous that he upset children that were in the waiting room.   I asked him what his name is and he informed me his name is Steven.  Our normal delivery man is named Gil, and Gil is the nicest person and is very helpful and understanding that pregnant women cannot carry heavy boxes for reasons of safety.  If you are unwilling to carry a box an extra 15 feet , then you can politely say no, there is no reason to be so nasty and yell in a crowded office, it is extremely unprofessional and someone with this attitude does not need to be in customer service.

originalText.text: Should definitely be taken off the list of UPS Amazon returns location. Amazon states in their email to just bring the return item as is and the store will pack and ship for it you but thats not the case here. You have to bring your item "ship ready" or they wont do anything for you and will turn you away without an explanation.
